text: Michael Gaudion (born 20 June 1938) is a former Australian rules footballer who played with North Melbourne in the VFL. Gaudion was a wingman and played his first two seasons of league football for North Melbourne under his father Charlie who was coach. He went on to appear in 152 games for the club and represented Victoria on occasions during the 1960s. ==External links== * Category:1938 births Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:North Melbourne Football Club players Category:Living people
title: Michael Gaudion
